name: Interstellar Impact
description:
Interstellar Impact in a stylized single player adventure game. Explore the vastness of space by traveling and evolving throughout different stages.



Starting as an innocent asteroid your goal is to evolve and progress to larger stages. Collide with smaller asteroids and evolve to the planet stage.



As you grow and become the source of all light in the universe your journey is not over. Do not hit any larger objects until you explode and become a black hole.



Defy gravity, increase your speed and set up the best time possible.
